General.Name: Aveng Ltd
General.Description: Aveng Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the construction and engineering, and mining activities in South Africa, Rest of Africa, Mauritius, Australia, New Zealand, the Pacific Islands, Southeast Asia, and internationally. The company operates as an engineering, construction, and maintenance contractor for the building, infrastructure, and resources sectors that delivers infrastructure solutions in the resources, energy, marine, water, civil, and transport sectors. It also provides open cut and underground mining services. In addition, the company supplies products to the automotive and steel beneficiation sectors. Aveng Limited is based in Johannesburg, South Africa.
